quote: The greatest of all mistakes is to do nothing because you think you can only do a little.   – Zig Ziglar
fact: Arnold Schonberg suffered from triskaidecaphobia, the fear of the number 13.  He died at 13 minutes from midnight on Friday the 13th.
tip: Use keyboard shortcuts to save time.
joke: Today a girl said she recognized me from vegetarian club, but I’m sure I’ve never met herbivore.
